name: Hot Black Bean Dip
description: A little spicy, very satisfying – and so simple. Kids love the melted cheese! Make it in the oven or the microwave.

ingredients.name: Guacamole Dip Mix or Poco Picante Salsa Mix

preparation: If baking, preheat oven to 350° F.
In food processor, combine beans with dip mix, lime juice, and water. Blend until smooth. Spoon into heat-proof serving dish. Top with grated cheese and heat in microwave or oven until bubbling.
tips: Use in quesadillas, burritos, and Mexican layer dips.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
